channel.title: website on Cortically Magnified
channel.description: Recent content in website on Cortically Magnified

item.description: My site is hosted on AWS S3. I was planning to use Travis to setup a pipeline, such that every time I push a new post to GitHub, it automatically generates the site and syncs with S3. The problem was that Travis’ cost structure seems to have changed, so it became less appealing. I gave GitHub Actions a shot. It worked very well. It’s easy to use and easy to program.
